attributes.action: Ebola crisis to have immediate review on aid
attributes.additional_details:
Ebola is a life threatening disease.

By getting the goverment to issue an immediate campaign I believe that many sufferers will get the aid they need in order to get the life they deserve.

All I am asking for is that the goverment release adverts and campaigns for Enola aid, they also need to review the screening at Heathrow airport to make it compulsory.

By signing this petition you are helping fight a deadly disease.
